name: W E S T W O R L D
name_original: W E S T W O R L D
description:
Story So Far
==========

You have paid you entry fee (a small fortune) now you must experience the Wild West in 8-bit glory....Welcome to...

'W E S T W O R L D'

After you get off the train try to defeat the Bandits attacking the Town and its Folk.

Q = Up

A = Down

O = Left

P = Right

M = Shoot your gun in the direction you face. Do not get close to Gunmen.

The firing is random - so your shots might fall short or go too far to reach the Bandits. Shooting from 4-8 steps back is the idea ... just like a Western :)

BEWARE - The Bandits have a longer range aiming to hit the Townsfolk!

REMEMBER - KEEP SOME DISTANCE 4-8 PACES (When Shooting)
